overview: The auspicious moment of the movie London to Paris happened on July 8. The filming has started in Greenwood, London.  The movie was shot in different places of England like London, Tower Bridge, Trafalgar Square, Wembley, Greenwood, Heathrow & polular places around which is releasing soon within this year's end. Directed by Ghanashyam Lamichhane, the film stars Samragyee RL Shah, Garima Sharma, Kabir Khadka and Nischal Khadka among others.  Before filming, the artist was given a workshop by artist Sarita Giri for a month.  A crew member informed that the film will be shot in London for 30 days and shortly after that in Paris there will be a shooting schedule of 7 days.  More than 50 percent of the technicians in the film are from India.  The film is being made under the joint banner of Gautam Productions and AB International.  The film is co-produced by Amit Basnet, Ajit Kumar Thapa, and Pari Rana.
title: London To Paris
